Name: FirePuzzle - Save the House
About the game: FirePuzzle - Save the House is a logic puzzle game especially for children. Your goal is to defend your house from fire. Try to keep it as far away from the fire. Don't forget to use available aids in difficult situations. Game Features: - A lot of challenging levels - The helicopter and rain that will help you to put out the fire - A fire truck which will be available after level 7 - Great soundtrack
